name: Bad Flight Simulator
description:
It’s not good, it’s bad! Pull unrealistic maneuvers in a boring, empty world. My goal is to make this game eventually good. But it's not good yet, it's still very bad. The aircraft can fly, but barely. Put your patience to the test in this mind-numbingly boring game! Try to have fun, and as always, thank you for choosing Bad Flight Simulator.
